experience: You and Robert Joseph both know Steven Roberts, Dr. DARRELL RICHARDSON, Mission Critical Ops, and 159 others

Great to represent Matrix Medical Network at the Evanta, a Gartner Company - Phoenix CISO Executive Summit Nov. 15, 2017, and be named the Cox Communications Session Prize Winner. This exclusive conference is designed to deliver peer insight and unparalleled networking. This invitation-only summit offers a platform to build and strengthen relationships within our influential community of leaders. The agenda is driven by the Governing Body of Chief Data Officers, CIOs, and CISOs to generate innovative, strategic solutions and strengthen the IT, security, and data and analytics functions across all industries. The goal is drive competitive advantage and exceed our business objectives through elevated leadership. Enlightening final panel with Mark Feller (VP, Technology, Arizona Cardinals Football Club), Monty Low (Dir. IT, Arizona Coyotes), Steve Reese (VP,CIO, Phoenix Suns), Chris Richardson (AVP, IT Dev, Arizona State University), and Christine Stoffel (CEO, SEAT - Sports & Entertainment Alliance in Technology). Also great seeing my peers Marnie Wilking (CISO, Orion Health), and @Jerry Walters (AVP, CISO, HonorHealth). Congratulations to all the winners. Thank you sponsors! Looking forward to the 2018 Summit.
The Organ at Frank Lloyd Wright’s Unity Temple in Oak Park, Illinois. I bet the organ sounds amazing in this space!
Why Smart Contracts Will Bring Blockchain to the Masses
What's everyone holding at the moment? I'm holding a select few until the end of Q1 2018 when I think we'll start to see some serious movements from some of the alts.

Along with photographing all of Wright's architecture, education is also a big part of that project and something I am truly passionate about. In the tradition of Wright, my first Photography Workshops were at Taliesin and Taliesin West and have now expanded to other Wright Sites. I believe art and creativity should be shared!!

My next workshop is Dec 2&3 at Taliesin West and it was full but we decided to add a few more spots. Here is sign up if you or someone you know maybe interested. Let me know if you have any questions. See you there!

• Partner to the world's largest blockchain supply chain project, establishing a top-tier talent team• Technology advisor to a world-class investment brokerage financial service startupRobert has successfully built and led Pinnacle Peak Partners operations including: accounting and finance, information technology, legal, marketing, sales and staffing.

•	Top-tier prominent multinational private manufacturing organization with offices in: USA, Canada, and the UK.•	Reported to both the CEO and CFO.•	Developed, staffed, and managed a cohesive team of Information Technology Professionals responsible for all technology aspects in a 24/7 environment. •	Key stakeholder who led the launch of a comprehensive security platform which included FireEye advanced cybersecurity managed services, Palo Alto firewalls and web proxies, penetration testing, phishing assessments, policies, training, remediation, and more.•	Led an immediate successful response to a catastrophic network environment disaster.•	Successfully managed a $1.2MM budget, introduced numerous strategies to reduce Operating Expenditures via contract renegotiation, new business partnerships, and more.  •	Well experienced in both out-sourcing as well as in-sourcing teams.
Vice-President (Strategy, Philanthropy, Technology), MBA Board of Directors

•	Gave back to the community through this elected position. •	Led the rebranding of the DePaul MBA association.•	Full-stack rebuild of the association website using modern web development tools on the backend and delivered an improved UI/UX on the frontend. •	Provided advisory in a number of areas including executive leadership, financial, philanthropy, and more.

•	Numerous organizational speaking engagements as a chair of a corporate-wide “think tank” program that reported to Executive Management.•	Developed and delivered annual ~$2MM strategic and tactical budgets which introduced profound security as well as technical advancements throughout the enterprise.•	Introduced numerous “good practices” following the ITIL/ITSM which aligned IT practices with the needs of the organization.  •	Full responsibility over Service Desk (tier-1, tier-2, and tier-3), Network Operations and Security, Datacenter, Business Intelligence, ERP, and Development and Programming.

•	Full administrative responsibility of the LAN/WAN among the USA corporate office and the Canada office.•	Worked with developers through full SDLC to design, test, and implement a comprehensive security auditing application.  •	Refreshed the datacenter with modern technology and drastically improved network availability to 99.9999%. •	Replaced the entire corporate telecommunications system and introduced VoIP which seamlessly connected the Canada office and greatly improved organizational communications.  •	Established a new ERP support partnership which saved the organization $1.5MM and counting.

recommendations: Renae Morrow
Application and Hardware Analyst at Blistex Inc.
September 15, 2017, Renae reported directly to Robert Joseph

Few people have had the opportunity to report to a manager who’s also a coach and mentor—but I did when I worked for Rob.I had the pleasure of working with Rob for several years at Blistex Inc., as part of his team and collaborating on several projects during that time.He is one of the greatest motivators I have met, he is the “go to person” when conflicts arise. He looks out for his team but is not one to draw attention to himself – his work does that for him. He has built a reputation as someone who has a broad vision and great insight.I must say that Rob is the best manager I’ve had in my career history and he would be a tremendous asset to any organization.His management philosophy is and I quote: “great teams aren't built by managers - rather, they are built by each person within the team.”
Renae Morrow

September 13, 2017, Robert Joseph managed Ross directly

It is rare that you come across someone as passionate about technology as Ross is!  When Ross first joined my team within the capacity of network administration, he hit the ground running immediately.  I was particularly impressed by Ross' ability to quickly acclimate to new technologies as well as his ability to effortlessly integrate into our team.  And as we worked together, I truly enjoyed hearing those daily updates from Ross after he became a father for the first time!  Ross is a valuable asset and I am confident in a bright future ahead for him.

September 13, 2017, Robert Joseph managed Cindy directly

Incredibly sincere and the ability to juggle a multitude of requests at any given time are phrases that come to mind when I think of Cindy.  Cindy worked with me for several years where she played a pivotal role providing all levels of technical support.  I was particularly impressed with Cindy's ability to built a strong rapport throughout the company and keep me informed of important day-to-day happenings.  During team meetings, Cindy always helped lighten the mood with some of the very best stories.  Whether within a technical or a leadership capacity, Cindy is truly a valuable asset.

summary: Robert is currently engaged with top-tier organizations, providing advisory in realms such as: cybersecurity, technology leadership, and top-tier talent that helps lift both startup as well as established organizations ($10M - $200MM annually).  Most recently, Robert has become a trusted partner to the world’s largest blockchain project.Ongoing education as well as paying-it-forward by helping others and giving back to the community is centric to Robert’s belief system.With a foundation in strategic and tactical technology operations management, Robert has taken a particular interest in security over the past ~20-years of his career.  This expertise includes areas such as: security program establishment, cybersecurity protection, training, auditing, remediation, incident response, and more.
name: Robert Joseph VadeBonCoeur
title: Top-Talent Strategist | Thought Leader | Innovator | Blockchain Enthusiast | Angel Investor | CIO/CTO/CISO
